item.title: Siesta Install
item.description: Main reference to Centos6.6系统里安装SIESTA 4 | 知乎 。 Related software and libraries are installed under ~/software if not otherwise specified. system and environment Linux version 5.15.90.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 (oe-user@oe-host) (x86_64-msft-linux-gcc (GCC) 9.3.0, GNU ld (GNU Binutils) 2.34.0.20200220) #1 SMP Fri Jan 27 02:56:13 UTC 2023 Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS GCC already installed openmpi
